name: ESP HP Steel Pro Eco Wad
name_short: ESP HP Steel Pro Eco Wad
description: ESP High Performance Pro Eco Wad is specifically crafted for knock down power, plus being harmless to the environment. Eley ’s ESP High Performance Pro Eco Wad is manufactured to achieve incredible performance for all large, 3” chambered shotguns, while still conforming to CIP regulations.
Available as 12 gauge 36g 1 shot and 36g 3 shot, loaded in a 76mm case.
*Only to be used in steel proofed guns. Always check the instructions provided with your gun and always read the instructions provided on the cartridge box.
